name: api
description: -Auth module      -register          ->/register post     -Activate         ->/activate/token->get     -Login         ->/login => post      -Profile         ->after login / me =>get     -Change password         ->after login/ change-passoword ->post     -Logout         ->after login/logout =>get     -Forget password         ->request for password =>post/forget-password     -Reset password          ->post/reset-password
